desc: A collection of minimal, crystal and botanical jewellery, ethically made from sustainable silver. All jewellery is handmade in the UK in our studio from sustainable silver and packaged with love in environmentally friendly packaging. Our pieces are timeless and unique - they also make perfect eco friendly gifts.

layout.text: Handmade from recycled silver and ethically sourced materials, we create simple yet beautiful pieces to help you find your everyday magic.
